error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Something went wrong. Try again or return to the homepage.

prayer_turn.subscribe_success_desc: You will be responsible for this time slot for the next 40 days
prayer_turn.subscribe_error: Error subscribing to the time slot
prayer_turn.subscribe_error_desc: An error occurred while trying to subscribe. Please try again later.

prayer_turn.unsubscribe_success_desc: You are no longer subscribed to the prayer shift
prayer_turn.unsubscribe_error_desc: An error occurred while trying to leave the shift. Please try again later.

onboarding.welcomeDescription: We are very happy to have you with us. In this setup process, you will define the details for your local church's 40 days and customize how prayer shifts are organized for the leaders.
onboarding.eventTypeHelp: Choose how the shifts will be organized.
onboarding.maxParticipantsHelp: Define how many participants can be in a shift.
onboarding.shiftDurationHelp: Enter how long each shift should last.
onboarding.configurationDescription: Fill in the fields below to configure your event.

cards.singleLeaderSlots: Time slots with only one leader
